title: MSc Artificial Intelligence
text:
Preface

title: 1  Introduction to machine learning
text:
1.1 What is machine learning?
Firstly we must ask ourselves, what is machine learning? Put simply, it is about learning (or [otherWordMissing]) from experience, without explicit programming. This definition is synthesised from more formal definitions in Samuel (1959).

title: 1  Introduction to machine learning
text: Samuel, A. L. 1959. “Some Studies in Machine Learning Using the Game of Checkers.” IBM Journal of Research and Development 3 (3): 210–29. https://doi.org/10.1147/rd.33.0210.

title: 2  Summary
text: In summary, this book has no content whatsoever.
